languages.text: Судя по рапортам, количество живых на корабле в десятки раз меньше, чем необходимо для обслуживания судна.
According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.
languages.original_text: Судя по рапортам, количество живых на корабле в десятки раз меньше, чем необходимо для обслуживания судна.

traits.locale_text: According to reports, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than required for ship's maintenance.
According to reports, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than required for ship's maintenance.
According to reports, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.
According to reports, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.
According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.
According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

languages.text: Dem Bericht zufolge ist die Anzahl der Lebenden an Bord um ein Dutzendfaches kleiner, als es für die vernünftige Wartung des Schiffs nötig ist.
languages.original_text: According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

traits.locale_text: Dem Bericht zufolge ist die Anzahl der Lebenden an Bord um ein Dutzendfaches kleiner, als es für die vernünftige Wartung des Schiffs nötig ist.

languages.text: D'après le rapport, le nombre de personnes vivantes à bord est plusieurs dizaines de fois inférieur aux effectifs nécessaires au fonctionnement normal du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

traits.locale_text: D'après le rapport, le nombre de personnes vivantes à bord est plusieurs dizaines de fois inférieur aux effectifs nécessaires au fonctionnement normal du vaisseau.

languages.text: 報告によれば、船の適切な維持に必要な人数に比べて、乗船している生存者の数は数十倍も少ないという。
languages.original_text: According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

traits.locale_text: 報告によれば、船の適切な維持に必要な人数に比べて、乗船している生存者の数は数十倍も少ないという。

languages.text: Según el informe, el número de personas vivas a bordo es muy inferior al necesario para un mantenimiento adecuado de la nave.
languages.original_text: According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

traits.locale_text: Según el informe, el número de personas vivas a bordo es muy inferior al necesario para un mantenimiento adecuado de la nave.

languages.text: 扫描报告显示，船上存活的船员数量严重不足，只有正常维护工作所需数量的几十分之一。
languages.original_text: According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

traits.locale_text: 扫描报告显示，船上存活的船员数量严重不足，只有正常维护工作所需数量的几十分之一。

languages.text: Rapora göre gemideki kişi sayısı, geminin düzgünce yönetilmesi için gereken insan sayısından birkaç kat daha az.
languages.original_text: According to the report, the number of living people aboard is dozens of times smaller than that required for proper ship maintenance.

traits.locale_text: Rapora göre gemideki kişi sayısı, geminin düzgünce yönetilmesi için gereken insan sayısından birkaç kat daha az.
